title: How to Import PST Files to Office 365

steps.title: Open the Outlook app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Outlook app on your computer. The Outlook icon looks like a white "O" in a blue square in front of an envelope icon. You can find it on your Start menu.

steps.title: Click the File tab on the top-left.
steps.content: Click the File tab on the top-left. You can find this button above the toolbar ribbon at the top of your screen. It will open your file options on a new menu.

steps.title: Click Open & Export on the menu.
steps.content: Click Open & Export on the menu. You can find this option on a blue navigation menu on the left-hand side.

steps.title: Click Import/Export on the menu.
steps.content: Click Import/Export on the menu. This will open the Import and Export Wizard in a new pop-up window.

steps.title: Select Import from another program or file.
steps.content: Select Import from another program or file . It's in the "Choose an action to perform" box.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . This will open a list of different file types you can import.

steps.title: Select Outlook Data File (.pst) and click Next.
steps.content: Select Outlook Data File (.pst) and click Next . This will allow you to select and import your PST file in the next step.

steps.title: Click Browse under "File to import.
steps.content: Click Browse under "File to import. " This button is in the upper-right corner of the Wizard window. It will open a new pop-up. You can select how you want to deal with duplicate items under "Options" here.

steps.title: Select the PST file and click Open.
steps.content: Select the PST file and click Open . If your PST file is password protected, you'll be prompted to enter it here.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next .

steps.title: Select Import items into the same folder in at the bottom.
steps.content: Select Import items into the same folder in at the bottom. When this option is selected, you can specify your Office 365 mailbox, and import your PST here.

steps.title: Enter your Office 365 account email into the text field.
steps.content: Enter your Office 365 account email into the text field. You can click the drop-down and select your email, or manually type it here.

steps.title: Click the Finish button.
steps.content: Click the Finish button. This will start importing all the data from your PST file to your Office 365 mailbox. You'll see your import progress in a pop-up box. The pop-up will automatically disappear when your import is finished.

steps.title: Open Outlook (Office 365 version) on your Mac.
steps.content: Open Outlook (Office 365 version) on your Mac. The Outlook icon looks like a white "O" in a blue square in front of an envelope icon. You can find it in your Applications folder. Make sure you have your Outlook version installed through your Office 365 subscription. If you have a different version, you can download the installer at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=45492 . If you have a different version of Outlook the app icon may look like a yellow "O." To view your Outlook version, click the Outlook tab on your Mac's menu bar on the top-left, and select About Outlook . If you have the Office 365 version you'll see "Office 365 Subscription" next to "License." [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Tools menu.
steps.content: Click the Tools menu. You can find this button above the toolbar ribbon at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click Import on the toolbar.
steps.content: Click Import on the toolbar. This button looks like a green, downward arrow and a blue figurehead in front of a table icon. It will open the Import window.

steps.title: Select Outlook for Windows archive file (.pst).
steps.content: Select Outlook for Windows archive file (.pst) . Select this option when you're prompted "What do you want to import?" in the Import window.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . This will open your file navigator in a new pop-up, and allow you to select the PST file to import.

steps.title: Select the PST file and click Import.
steps.content: Select the PST file and click Import . This button is in the lower-right corner of the file navigator pop-up. It will start importing the data from your PST file.

steps.title: Click Finish.
steps.content: Click Finish . When your import is finished, click this button to close the Import window.
